arm_group.description: GLPG0634 100mg capsule once a day for 10 days in healthy subjects between 40 and 50 years old
GLPG0634 100mg capsule once a day for 10 days in healthy subjects between 65 and 74 years old
GLPG0634 100mg capsule once a day for 10 days in healthy subjects of 75 years and older

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to evaluate the amount of compound present in the blood
      (pharmacokinetics) after single and of multiple doses of GLPG0634 in elderly healthy
      subjects.

      During the course of the study, the effect of aging on the pharmacokinetics as well as the
      effects of GLPG0634 on mechanism of action-related parameters in the blood
      (pharmacodynamics) will be assessed and the safety of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 in
      elderly healthy subjects will be characterized.

clinical_study.brief_title: Single and Multiple Dose Pharmacokinetics of GLPG0634 in Elderly Healthy Subjects

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Healthy male or female, age 40 years and older

          -  BMI between 18-30 kg/m2

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Any condition that might interfere with the procedures or tests in this study

          -  Drug or alcohol abuse

          -  Smoking

intervention.intervention_name: GLPG0634 100mg capsule once a day for 10 days

facility.name: SGS LSS Clinical Pharmacology Unit Antwerp

clinical_study.official_title: Single and Multiple Dose Pharmacokinetics of GLPG0634 in Elderly Healthy Subjects

overall_official.affiliation: SGS LSS Clinical Pharmacology Unit Antwerp

oversight_info.authority: Belgium: Federal Agency for Medicinal Products and Health Products

primary_outcome.description: To characterize the amount of GLPG0634 in plasma over time - pharmacokinetics (PK) - after single and multiple oral doses in different age groups, including elderly healthy subjects, thereby assessing the effect of aging
primary_outcome.measure: The amount of GLPG0634 in plasma over time after single and multiple doses of GLPG0634
primary_outcome.time_frame: From predose (before first study drug administration) up to 72 hours post last study drug administration

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the effects of GLPG0634 on mechanism of action-related biomarkers in the blood over time - pharmacodynamics (PD) - after multiple oral doses in different age groups, including elderly healthy subjects, thereby assessing the effect of aging
secondary_outcome.measure: The amount of GLPG0634 mechanism-of-action-related biomarkers in blood after multiple doses of GLPG0634
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From predose (before first study drug administration) up to 24 hours post last study drug administration

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 in healthy subjects of different age groups, including elderly, in terms of the number of adverse events reported
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From screening up to 10 days after the last study drug administration

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 in healthy subjects of different age groups, including elderly, in terms of changes in vital signs as measured by heart rate, blood pressure and body temperature reported
secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in vital signs as measured by heart rate, blood pressure and body temperature
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From screening up to 10 days after the last study drug administration

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 in healthy subjects of different age groups, including elderly, in terms of changes in 12-ECG measures reported
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From screening up to 10 days after the last study drug administration

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 in healthy subjects of different age groups, including elderly, in terms of changes in physical examination reported
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From screening up to 10 days after the last study drug administration

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 in healthy subjects of different age groups, including elderly, in terms of changes in blood safety lab parameters assessed
secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in blood safety lab parameters
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From screening up to 10 days after the last study drug administration

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 in healthy subjects of different age groups, including elderly, in terms of changes in urine safety lab parameters assessed
secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in urine safety lab parameters
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From screening up to 10 days after the last study drug administration

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
